meanings.definition: The state or quality of not being unique.
meanings.sent1: The nonuniqueness of the snowflakes made them all look the same.
meanings.sent2: In a world full of copies, the nonuniqueness of her artwork stood out.
meanings.sent3: The nonuniqueness of the identical twins always caused confusion among their friends.
meanings.sent4: The nonuniqueness of his approach to problem-solving was both refreshing and effective.
meanings.sent5: The nonuniqueness of the fingerprints left at the crime scene helped solve the mystery.

meanings.sent1: The nonuniqueness of the designs made it hard to choose the best one.
meanings.sent2: She was disappointed by the nonuniqueness of the souvenirs at the gift shop.
meanings.sent3: The nonuniqueness of his jokes made everyone in the room groan.
meanings.sent4: The nonuniqueness of the melody made it blend in with all the other songs.
meanings.sent5: The nonuniqueness of the plot twist made the movie predictable from the start.
